name: STROKE (AluriSnow)
description:
Help Tana escape as she gets lured into a building and gets trapped! Tana is face to face with a bunch of horrid ink-like slime monster, and if Tana touches them, she dies. Except for a few friendly ones, they won’t hurt Tana!! Eventually she will gain the ink power to fight back though!

------

FEATURING:

- A cute ink girl

-ink monsters

-platforms

-a cute ink girl beating up ink monsters

-cutscenes 

------

 game is probably receiving updates!! I want to improve on it 

This is the first “proper” game I’ve made pls excuse the bugs and stuff I rly tried my best to make dis by solely relying on my senseis, online tutorials and my half-assed art knowledge thank 

 p.s: also it wasn’t clear in-game but pls shoot door before approaching it at the end thanks!
